resources.string: To connect to your ecoWatering system, you need to receive the request from your EcoWateringHub.\n\nChoose the way you like to receive the request.
You won\'t be able to manage this ecoWatering Hub.
You are successfully disconnected from this ecoWatering Hub.
The name you choose will be used to recognize your device.
Now you can manage your ecoWatering system.
Try with another ecoWatering Hub, or continue to manage that.
This device is already connected with this ecoWatering Hub
We will use your Bluetooth to allow you, to be paired with the ecoWatering Hub only
Waiting for an ecoWatering Hub WiFi connection request…
